entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 07:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h except 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Wind becoming light before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
